entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Temperature: 8.2°C

Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: E 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
